markdownRemark.html:
in chicago, the cold breeze-sweeps the hands of boys and girls into the safety and shelter

of suede and felt … corduroy pocket dwellings hiding each child’s treasure trove:

  1. multicolor dryer lint
  2. Incredibles 2 ticket stub,
  3. hard candy, RED
  4. a shining penny (from his birth year)

handle each item blindly roll over tip and palm.

don’t think of the face sting!

but of home, and your toes

buried in the shag carpet.
